DOC.brief_summary: With study , aim compare operative result complication rate transurethral resection prostate ( TUR-P ) perform resectoscopes two different bipolar monopolar energy source .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Different Energy Sources During TUR-P
DOC.detailed_description: Following data collect evaluate prospectively three group patient undergo TUR-P due benign prostate hyperplasia ( BPH ) one resectoscopes use different energy source : 1 . Preoperative data : age , height , weight , body-mass index , concomitant morbidity , use drug , history operation , duration lower urinary tract symptom , history previous treatment take BPH , serum level prostate specific antigen , prostate volume , maximum average urine flow rate , postmicturation residual urine volume , hemoglobin level 2 . Operative data : duration operation , volume resect tissue , observation obturator reflex ( ) , kind size urethral catheter use 3 . Postoperative data : time removal urethral catheter , hospitalization duration , change hemoglobin , rate blood transfusion , complication
DOC.criteria: Having indication due BPH Aged 40 80 year old Kidney failure due BPH Any kind coagulopathy use anticoagulant preoperative period History previous open endoscopic prostate surgery
